Daily Supporting tagline 

puts "hello"
name = "awsam"
puts("hello #{name}")

class Apple
  def fun1
    puts @a
    puts "@@"
  end
  
  def fun2
    @a = "apple"
  end
end 

apple=Apple.new
#apple.fun2
apple.fun1
apple.fun2
apple2=nil
if apple2
  puts "ok"
else
  puts "false"
end


puts :awsam

<<EEE
class Man
  attr_reader :name,:age
  

  def initialize
    age=0
    @name=""
  end

  def set_name(n)
    @name=n
  end

  def set_age(n)
    @age=n
  end
  
  def show
    print "%s %s"%[@name,@age]
  end
end

wiser=Man.new
wiser.show
wiser.set_name "wiser"
wiser.set_age 100
wiser.show
puts ""
 20.times {puts "2.times"}
EEE
<<DDD
def show()
  puts "show"
end

def start()
  puts "start"
  return :show
end

a=method(:show)
a.call
b=start
c=method(b)
c.call
DDD








<<BBB
cities = {'BJ' => "beijing",'NJ'=> "nanjing"}
def find_city(map,state)
  if map.include?(state)
    return map[state]
  else
    return "not fond"
  end
end

cities["find"] = method(:find_city)

while true
  print "state?"
  state=gets.chomp
  break if state.empty?
  puts cities["find"].call(cities,state)
end


BBB



<<AAA
def show()
  puts "hello"
end

def start()
  puts "world"
  show()
end

#  start
stuff = "hello wrld a thing si".split(' ')
print stuff
print "\n"
puts stuff[1]
puts stuff.pop()
puts stuff.join(' ')
puts stuff.values_at(1,2).join('#')
AAA
